author: neoshade123
title: Excellent Exclusive
review:
This is an excellent giveaway set I got at the Nashville Grand Opening

Pros

  • Good display piece
  • Lots of parts for an exclusive
  • Lots of tiny detail in the store
  • Roof comes off too see a Ceiling view of the store
  • Mini Pick-a-Brick wall and Cash register
  • Roof looks like top of a brick with the ceiling light being the bottom

Cons

  • Exclusive (a given)
  • Simple build
  • Doors don't open
  • Not quite as big as the store I've seen (space inside looks cramed together, not enough floor space, should be more elongated to be accurate)

It was a fun build that took 10 or so minutes but still a nice set. If you can go to any of the openings and get this I would recommend it and for free with a purchase of $35 or more it's basically a steal but it is only limited 300 per store so act fast at the opening you go to.
